pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fetch Geologic Data from the 'Macrostrat' Platform // Work with the 'Macrostrat' (https://macrostrat.org/) Web Service (v.2, https://macrostrat.org/api/v2) to fetch geological data relevant to the spatial and temporal distribution of sedimentary, igneous, and metamorphic rocks as well as data extracted from them.
